entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 5 cm over southern sections. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 17 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries over southern sections. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
